name: Extreme Truck Hill Drive: Real Mountain Climb-er
name_original: Extreme Truck Hill Drive: Real Mountain Climb-er
description:
Extreme Truck Hill Drive : Real Mountain Climb-er is about to start in the snow hill station with truck driving on mountain steep paths and hill climb roads. Become a pro off road trucker to deliver cargo, logs and woods to the snow hill station with off road truck driving. Carry luggage with great care, transport cargo on your off road truck and deliver it to the hill station. Extreme driving includes mountains, hills, landslides, rugged terrains & dangerous turns. Precision driving will make your task easier. Navigate on the hilly roads with your cargo truck. Extreme snow driving, snowy environment to explore, cargo delivery and thrilling ride over the mountains and hill top. Different weather conditions with snow and land sliding will make your vehicle off road driving even more challenging.


FEATURES

• Real Experience of Driving Cargo Truck
• Explore the Hill Side Environment
• Transport Logs, Vehicles & Other Stuff
• Thrill of Driving on Hills, Mountains and Steep Paths
• Real-time Physics Controls for Driving Off Road
• Play as a Pro Trucker
